content.text:
# Consejo de Monumentos Nacionales

| minister1_name    = Ángel Cabeza
| website           =
}}
The National Monuments Council (Spanish: Consejo de Monumentos Nacionales) is a Chilean government agency dedicated to the preservation and upkeep of special natural, historical and cultural sites in Chile. The National Monuments Council was created in 1925 by law Nº 17.288.
See also
* List of National Monuments of Chile
